content: Nice port of the board game. Addictive and fun!

This is a frustrating adaption of an alright board game. The original already has more than enough randomness (will I hit one time, or three?) This adds so many extra layers that it's honestly just frustrating (Will I hit one time, or three, using dice with a 74.3% probability to land face up, unless I level up? Will I hit the 1 HP zombie or the 12 HP zombie? Will I do 3 damage or 15?)
A lot of fun. Hope they expand
Great game

The game is awesome, but if you change device, asmodee esteem that they deserve your money again for every paid content. They also forger to include customer support and will not answer to any request. So do not bother... I will avoid everything developped by them from now on.

I liked the game so much, I bought all add-ons. However, after I had to reinstall, all progress was gone and all add-ons were no longer accessible. Sadly, a common bug that hasn't been fixed for more than a year :-(((
Fantastic just like playing the board game
Fix found: after installing the game search the net for the data of this game and paste it in your SD CARD android/obb/

Controls great, nice artwork, gameplay is simple and straight forward. The need to plan ramps up a third of the way through the campaign but the difficulty never feels overwhelming. Enjoyed this for a while before the dice rolling got tiresome.

Every single mission is EXACTLY the same... go here, fight a wave, clear a house, and escape... just like IRL, they charge too much for a product. The art and graphics are great though, so at least they have that.
Its fun, especially when you want a quick game of zombicide without setting up your board game

I was having a good time playing this, but I got stuck on a level that would not progress, so I uninstalled trying to correct that, and now the game won't install at all. I have not heard back from support for awhile now. I wouldn't be that mad if this game was free, but I expected better for a paid game from Asmodee Digital. Their other games are great. Edit: Over a month now, still haven't heard from support, still can't play this game that I paid for. I would avoid it at all costs.

I enjoy the game as a way to pass the time. However, I recently had to reset my phone and upon redownloading the app, all the DLC bundles I purchased became locked again. Not sure if they are progress locked or it's an error with the app. Besides this inconvenience, the game is fun and intuitive.
Different to the board game but I still enjoyed it. Wish it was a little harder tho
Was nice until I changed phone. Now games won't open saying "Application Error. Ressource Spreadsheet {db_classes} is not found". Support has yet to answer me :(
too many game breaking bugs. ignored and not updated for years now.

I like the reimagining of the game for the app, but the game is buggy and there are no clear save points or options. I often would come back to the game to find a level breaking bug where objectives I needed had disappeared forcing a restart. There are also just annoying issues like collecting gear, leaving the app mid level, the returning to find the same gear markers had reappeared and the gear upon re-collecting would be different. Often worse. Really needs a skip all animations option too.
Rip off! The game costs ~$8, yet you still have to buy characters for $3 each! This is such a joke. I want my money back

This is a really fun game. I enjoyed my playthroughs. My main contention is that it hasn't been updated in a year and, after playing through a few times, there's nothing new or different. When this came out, it sounded like they would be adding on to it over time. They have a lot of material to pull from in expanding the game. But... No expansion, no bug fixes either. Nothing. Fun for a time or two through. Don't waste your money on extra characters, not with it.
Great but I was hoping for something more similar to the table top version. This can be repetitive at times.
Loses your paid DLC when you reset progress. Otherwise great game. I reset it because I wanted to play it again. Unfortunately updates seem to have stopped.
Very Addictive, I am a great fan of the board game and I really enjoyed this mobile adaptation with few changes from the rules of the board game. Really worth it, thank you devops.
Fantastic version of a great game. Please please please give us a Zombiecide: Black Plague adaptation next!

A very well done game. Gives the classic Zombicide feel while being optimized for phones. The only downsides I think are due to the platform itself (phone battery life, phones aren't a comfortable platform for extended play, etc.). I would love to see this come to a console. Also would love to see a sequal!
Good game, but to short for something you have to pay for.
Beautiful game. I love the boardgame. This is not that, but it created a Zombiecide world I could quarantine inside of. Only downside is the lack of multiplayer.
Refuses to launch citing some database issue. Still waiting for a refund.
Loved the game on my S9. Switched to a 7T and it would not run. Sent an email to their support.. nothing. Disappointed.
Once you complete the game no reason to keep playing, they aren't putting new content up for it.

I preferred this version over the actual zombicide board game because of the progression system and story. Challenge keeps up with progression through about mid-game, but becomes far too easy by the end. This provided entertainment worth the price tag , but I've seen about everything this game has to offer. I'd pay for a new map/story pack but I don't see the point in purchasing new characters that don't differ that much from stock.
Fun game. Makes me want to look at the board games.

It's well executed, but the lack of any documentation on what the various weapon abilities mean is a serious flaw. Many times I've met the exact condition to use an ability and I can't use it. Clearly the conditions are more complicated than the text in the app says but there is no way to know what the actual conditions for using the ability are. Makes what would otherwise be a great game very frustrating. I'd give it 5 except for this one issue.

I own all the board games. This is a fun and different twist to zombicide. Its not the same but for being single player and having more of an RPG feel its a lot of fun. Nice work look forward to more maps!
Having fun but really disappointed that the Swordmaster II ability isn't allowing Amy to dual wield. 5 stars if they fix this.... yes it is that disappointing!
best game adaptation of board game series

If you buy the extra characters dont reinstall game. Data does not save. I lost all my pay for characters because of this. Good little strategy game with a zombicide feel. It is not the app version of the board game. There is also a glitch when taking a different character on the first mission the game becomes unresponsive (its why i reinstalled the game) only to lose my pay for characters. Hoping they fix these little issues but its good and challenging enough game so i will continue to play.
how do i dual wield?
If it was same as the actual board game it would be awesome! Also to many Microtransactions!
A good adaption of the boardgame even if not completely the same. Highly addictive. Really a great game
I thought it was a faithful recreation of the board game, I was disappointed to find out it isn't. Not my cup of tea.

interesting game, good transposition of the board game, but absurd that the online purchaseses made on a device does not synchronize with the my others devices with same android/play store account! I bought a couple of packages on the tablet to find out that I have to spend the money again to get them even on my smartphone! Almost a scam!

Edit: bug mission 5-2 freezes after you clear the backstreet. unable to proceed. Pixel 4 XL. Brilliant game, lots of fun and has mini replay value (farming) to get more upgrades. Wish it had cloud sync so i could play accross devices, would be nice to play on big screen when at home! Well worth it, recommened. Make me want to get the board game now!
Enjoyed this a lot more than expected. Never played the board game but ordered a copy of Black Plauge after I found this to be do much fun.

I was looking forward to the game but was very disappointed. Game is too easy, too repetitive and tedious. At no point in game I felt the characters could die. In the end it was just about trying to get through the levels to get to the end. If at least the story would be worth it but the story feels like it was written by 10 year old.

Awesome game. Solid and very smooth. I rarely have time to finish a whole level in one sitting so I love that i can put my phone to sleep and pick up where I left off later. Would have been nice to move the group as a whole as well as individually. I played the whole game without buying characters and was never once even asked to buy. This is not play to win as one reviewer suggested. Perfect length for a mobile game.

Fun game. Some of the micro transactions for more characters seemed unnecessary. Especially when you pay for a game that has energy bars and other got you mechanics. It is fun though and similar to the tabletop.

WAY Too $$ for small amount on content. Played thru entire game in two days of casual play. For cost of Game plus DLC characters, I expected much more. Asmode, you guys are better than this. Game is fun but cost is just nuts! Not even multi player. Now the good! Low learning curve. Improvements over the board game with zombie damage and upgradeable characters and weapons. And only ingame purchases are additional characters, which are not needed to enjoy the game.

Playtowin??? It has very similar elements to the original boardgame but gets tough quickly. It's very similar to Warhammer quest in that respect where you really need to play over and over to gain xp or spend money to get there faster.
I love this game, I just wish you could increase the difficulty.

I really like the core gameplay of this. It's a cool re-imagining of the board game's concepts into a persistent RPG. The math is a bit loose, but it's always fun. Problems? Well there are some really annoying bugs, like how trash weapons randomly spawn in my inventory, or how sometimes I can't equip weapons that I know I have for no good reason. Also, I bought all of the DLC, only to have it all vanish when I reset my progress. I contacted the developer and was told tough luck. If fixed? 5 stars

Won't load the game unless connected to the internet. Why is this needed? And purchases are not account bound? Ie, I paid for some characters but can only use them on the device they were bought on? Even if my Google and Asmodee accounts are on both devices?
replyContent:
Hello, 

You can contact us here, if you have any question regarding the game: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/zombicide/?=undefined&contact=1

Thank you! 

Asmodee Digital Support Team

content: I had to wipe the data cache on it to get around a bug in the game, which I've reported and now I've lost all the DLC characters that I bought for it. I've reported it to see what can be done so now I wait.
replyContent:
Hello Craig, 

We're deeply sorry about this. 
Thank you for reporting this issue to us! We've taken a note of it. 

Best regards, 

Asmodee Digital Support Team

content: Super fun and smooth game! No glitches and the gameplay is quick and intuitive. Also, there is no way to buy in game currency which is really nice!
replyContent:
Hello Alec, 

Thank you for your support. 
Have a nice game! 

Asmodee Digital Support Team

content: Love the board game, but this felt pretty dull and linear.
replyContent:
Hello Ian, 

We're sorry to read that the game didn't reach your expectations. 
We've taken a note of your review. 

Thank you.

Asmodee Digital Support Team

content: Love it!!
replyContent:
Hello Christian, 

Many thanks for your support! 

Asmodee Digital Support Team

content: Really fun game. Full of challenges. Think your moves out logically and you'll be fine.
replyContent:
Hello David, 

Thank you for your support and positive feedback! Have a nice game. 

Best regards, 

Asmodee Digital Support Team

content: I really love this world. I love the board games, and even play using tabletop simulator. Never knew this existed until I happen to come across a YouTube video of people playing it. Few minutes later, I bought it. And I'm having a good time playing it. Which is surprising. Becuase I hate mobile gaming.
great game if you dont like doing the clean up after you done playing i will give a 5 star its just that im on one mission where it freezes after i kill the a bomb please fix
Solid game. Gameplay was fun, and even though each mission didn't feel too different from the last, I didn't find it repetitive. Only downside would be replayability is pretty limited.

Good, fun adaption of the boardgame. Negatives are it's too easy and doesn't have difficulty settings. There was only one level where I was forced to tactically bunker down into a choke and wait it out. it would also be good to be able to check upgrades and upgrade weapons and characters on the same screen. Currently theres some flipping back and forth to figureout optimum builds. Something like an Endless Hordes mode would spice things up too.

game save not shared between devices. the game work fine on my tablet but very problematic on my black shark phone, can only play 1 time and then the game always freeze during startup on subsequent play.
Excellent board game replication! Love what this company is doing.
found defect on zone8 2/5. after clear the area game is freezing, can do only quite the game, happened 2times already

This is a great game with a lot of potential. It's fun to choose your characters/weapons to tackle the hordes of zombies that are thrown at you. A couple complaints. Game overall was too easy. Very rarely did I not get a perfect mission on 1st try. 2nd, there is not much replayability with the game. You can restart the game but that is it. Please consider adding difficulty settings, multiplayer and custom maps. I am sure more campaigns and characters are in the game's future for an added fee.

I'm loving zombies!! Its got what I think are great RPG elements and the general gameplay rox-the-casba!! I never played the board game, but I printed out the board game instructions and I was really impressed with how many elements of it were incorporated into the zombies digital version, yay!!
wish it was more like the boardgame.

GOOD BUT SHORT! I've always wanted the boardgame, but it's costly and table-hogging. I thought this would be a good alternative, but it's just one scenario. Which was fun - interesting characters, a sense of humor - but not super challenging. I was done in a couple weeks of casual play. Considering all the in-app purchases, I expected another, harder scenario, but nope. "You can play through it again!" Yay? If they want to make more $, they should sell reasonably-priced, HARDER scenarios.

It's an okay adaptation of an excellent game. Assets were lazily cut and paste. some of the character art is blurry. It doesnt feel balanced. Some of the character classes get weaponry that outclasses everything else. Not sure it was worth the money i paid.
Good execution, but a bit bland and tedious. Gameplay is not evolving and I miss creativity in solving the levels. It's just killing and activating the key points on the map.

Fun enough but the getting new equipment is not rewarding. You cannot dual wield same-name items of different rarities. level thirteen dual uncommon hatchets does more damage than any one-handed melee weapon. I have a rare hatchet but it is useless even though the weapons have the same name and the dual symbol!
replyContent:
Hello, 

We're deeply sorry if our game didn't reach your expectations. 
Please make sure to contact our Support here : https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/zombicide/?=undefined&contact=1

Thank you.
Best regards, 

Asmodee Digital Support Team

content: Great game just like the board game. There are a few difference but it's still good. I wish it had a ‚Äùcustom mode‚Äù where we could create a map and put the objectives or a at least a node with random generated maps with scalating difficulty for replayability, I still haven't finished the campaign but I have a feeling it will lack replayability later on.

I'm having a great time playing this game so far. It feels tense when there's a pile of zombies slowly shambling your way. Where is cloud save though? I want to play this game on my tablet/phone without having to start over. Game needs some options to speed up animations, and to incorporate achievements as well. Basically a great time, but missing some of quality of life options.
replyContent:
Hello, 

We're deeply sorry about this.
Please make sure to contact our Support here : https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/zombicide/?=undefined&contact=1

Thank you.
Best regards, 

Asmodee Digital Support Team

content: Fun port of the boardgame. @devs: Accuracy of target selection should really be improved (even on tablet). More detailed infos on the rules would be another improvement.

As a fan of Zombicide i love this game. I bought all the characters and they are all quite fun. The thing that worries me is that after the 40 missions are done...the game will lose most of the fun factor. Hopefully there will be more content updates in the future.

Seriously awesome fun! Developer is quite good and the price is very reasonable. you absolutely do not need to purchase any DLC to enjoy this game, however Belle and Raoul (DLC) are my favorite characters and I am quite glad that I did get them. Reasonable challenge, though not ridiculously tough... I call it just about right. enough to keep me interested without seeming ridiculous (that being said, I'm not even halfway done yet)...You have wasted money elsewhere get this game!! (Moto Z2)
Enjoying it so far! Hoping they continue to produce more content, specifically additional missions or expansions. Seeing a Black Plague or Green Horde would be even better.

Why would you complain about characters you don't need? This game is great with what you get out of the gate and much better than the tabletop version, which is too much of a slog for my tastes. Probably only a 4, but giving it a bump for justice (and to offset terrible reviews).

Definitely not a good substitute for the board game. Way too easy and way over simplified.. Also already lost my progress, as you are forced into the tutorial if you get logged out, and if you login, it then overwrites your progress with the new start. perfect üëçüèº.. Just glad I wasn't very far, probably won't play it often anyway.

I rarely write reviews, especially negative ones. However, as much as I have enjoyed the game the purchase of dlc has not gone well. I paid but did not get my characters and now I get nothing but questions and run around when I contact the company. Buyer beware.
replyContent:
Hi Darren, 
We are deeply sorry for the issue you're encountering. 
Please contact our support team here https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/zombicide/ 

Best regards, 
Asmodee Digital

content: great game. bit on the easy side. would give 5 stars except have had to quit the game mid level quite a few times when the input ignores touches. still very much worth the money for the game. no pay to win.

Very fun zombie game Never played the board game before but will after this. Love the chracters and the DLC is optional and reasonably priced. Hope they add more maps and themes and not give up on it. Very impressed
Awesome digital port of the tabletop game. Are you guys working on Black Plague???
pretty good but gets too easy as you go along. also, when you reset your progress you also lose any characters that you have purchased.
Super fun and exciting. Great to have on a portable device.. Worth purchasing.

This encompasses a bit of Zombicide's tactical gameplay, but adds a bit too much easy factor to the game. I'm not a tactical genius or anything but I just finished my first playthrough in less than a week and I completed every map on perfect everytime. None of my survivors ever got hit and I found the game way too easy. I think the main issue is that the starting survivor eventually can shoot off like 49 shots in a round. If you buy one of the less OP characters then the game could be better.

I am really enjoying Zombicide. Addictive and fun. My only complaint is the inability to link progress and purchases on multiple devices. One request tho...Please add a random generated map mode with progressively harder levels!
Game is great time waster. Found a bug but has since been patched. Changed from 4 to 5 stars. If you enjoy the boardgame you will definitely enjoy this.
Great game. The dlc is not a necessary component and it's not pay to win. graphics are decent and gameplay has been smooth. Had a few bugs that seem to have been worked out. Good time killer.
replyContent:
Hello, 
Thank you for your feedback, you can contact our team here : https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/zombicide/
Best regards 
Asmodee Digital

content: i am having a great time playing this game!! I even picked up the board game.
loots from my campaign keep missing,what the hell is going on

I reslly enjoy this game, it really is like the board game but the lack of multiplayer for now makes me give this one less star. Playing with your friends is what makes the board game so fun and I really hope multiplayer gets introduced so we can play co-op.
Very nice game, so close to the board game. Zombies have HP, but that's fine. Hope they make a black plague one.
Going back and completing old missions only gives food you do not get the items you find
if you like playing the board game this is a great fix when you dont have time to set the game up!

Great app! Have the boardgame at home, but this is a nice addition.  Couple of remarks:  - In the boardgame, you eliminate the runners and toxic zombies first. Why not in the app?  - Would love the option in the settings that just skips the spawning of the zombies instead of clicking 'skip' all the time.  -Any chance of the zombie dogs/ crows etc.. to appear in later stages?  Overall...would highly recommend the game. Two thumbs up!

very fun game! a little grinding at times oh, so you can get the best weapons and more food to improve your weapons and levels. many of the weapons are useless. melee characters who do not have toxic zombie immunity early don't get to get fielded. with a little rebalancing, would be an amazing game.
Fantastic game but level 40 is bugged, will not progress missions.

Fun game. All 40 missions completed and all peffect. Zombie spawns don't correlate 1:1 with the physical boatd game; changing this in later levels and at higher threat levels would make the game more challenging. Being able to upgrade weapons and character skills is a positive change from the board game. Character limits need to be started per mission or removed. Final zone set is quite buggy but not unbeatable. May need to retry a mission a couple times before it registers your progress.

I really like the game. I think you all should add random free play maps not campaign related. Also should be able to use weapons right after picked up. I'm not sure if cars come into play, I'm only in zone 2, but would be good to incorporate if not. Would also like to see seasons/expansions from board game utilized in future updates. Looking forward to see this develop.
I love this game. I have wanted the board game for ages now so this is great. I hope they make black plague.

Fun game. I am happy with gameplay, and it does pose new challenges as your progress. The very last mission has a glitch where your objectives do not register as complete when they are complete (64/40 zombies killed, for example). this needs to be fixed.

Well done devs !!!! I hope we get the chance to play Rue Morgue and Black Plague .... Maybe Invader ?!?!? I can only wish :) The one thing i wish you could change is the possibility of an extra activation for different zombie types. That would definitely keep us on edge !!!
Good game. But locks up and can't move or do anything except leave the game...and lose your your progress. They need to work the bugs out.
replyContent:
Hello,
Thank you for your interest, sorry for the bugs please contact our team here https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/zombicide/ 
Best regards 
Asmodee Digital

content: So apparently they dropped the price of all DLC. Anyone who was dumb enough to purchase one yesterday got robbed, nice! Edit : Asmod√©e did refund me. Appreciated and changed my review accordingly.
replyContent:
Hello Julien,

We did not modify any price, could you please send an e-mail regarding this issue to our customer support here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/asmodee-net/?l=en&contact=1
Thank you.
Best regards, Asmodee Digital Support

content: not as good as board game but its fun
Really enjoyable to play and captures the spirit of the board game without being an exact copy. Well done. My one complaint would be that I've finished the campaign too quickly!

I'm a big fan of the original board game, but this doesn't recreate the experience 1to1, which is a good thing. Adding more game elements that would be impossible on the table really makes this a fun mobile adaptation. I know some disapprove of the pay wall for extra characters, but that doesn't bother me. I'm currently half way through the campaign and only just have my first loss, so the difficulty isn't too great, but outside the tutorial missions, I haven't felt that the stages are too easy.

i am really digging this game! I have the Zombicide board game and almost all of the expansions (didnt get the last expansion offered on Kickstarter) and this game is a nice little diversion when you are on the go and want to do a little zombie slaying. I hope the devs continue to add content.

Not a "cash grab" by any stretch of the imagination. This is a faithful recreation of the board game and a LOT of fun to play. There are five free characters to use (one unlocked during gameplay and another when you create a free Asmodee account) and stacks of weapons to find. The gameplay is easy and intuitive, the storyline is humourous and fun to follow - this app is a must for fans of the game!

great reimagining of the board game. there are characters locked behind a pay wall, but before you complain about that 1. realize that none of them are necessary to enjoy the game, and 2. the board game has far far more add on that cost quite a bit more than the digital version.
great gamee until very last mission, which is bugged. Killed the boss, but mission doesn't move progress to the next stage.
replyContent:
Hello, 
Please contact our support https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/zombicide/ for any bugs
Best regards 
Asmodee Digital

content: Awesome :)
a boring waste of money üò•
Good game, maybe a little easy. i have an issue where the game doesn't display any weapon stats so im hoping that the weapons I'm equipping ate better, please fix!

I really like the game. It is different from the boardgame but provides a nice single player experience and also the feeling of progress. I do not know if I would buy additional characters, but I would gladly buy additional scenarios if it was an option. The game should synchronise progress so we could play from different devices. There is an issue when you loot something after the end of the mission the looted item is missing and instead there is a duplicate of one of your items.

really fun, straightforward tactics game. great adaptation of a miniatures war game. I wish there were more games like this, offline, no paying for gems, etc. unlocking a few characters isn't necessary and the game feels like a full experience without paying for any of the character packs. please do more expansion maps and more games just like this with all the different themes. star wars imperial assault would be great if it were made mobile like this
It has successfully captured the feel of the board game. I'm enjoying it. I hope more mission content is coming in the future.
pretty good but i cannot finish the last mission. after kilking 40 zombies, objectives is not updated and you are stuck in a loop to kill zombies
cool game really
Wont let me refund even though it hasn't even been a day
replyContent:
Hello,

Asmodee Digital

content: The game is as fun as the board version and you can spend many hours enjoying it. As already mentioned on other reviews the rules were adapted and the character skills are also different from the original. Extra characters can be bought separately but apparently it doesn't change the experience at all. it's important to notice that is a single player game.

Really fun game. Good alternative if you don't feel like whipping out your board game to play. The price is reasonable for what you get. No ads, no delays, straight shoot em' up game. Would give a 5 star but I have encountered a glitch where I can't swipe to attack. Please fix issue.
not to bad. not the same as the table top game. difficulty ramps up to quickly. gets expencive. but can be fun, just don't expect the same type of play as the table top game.
was hoping for something closer to the actual boardgame.
can we have a proper tutorial for us noobs? sadly i have never played the table top version
Great digital adaptation! Dual wielding doesn't seem to be working?
precisa do modo multiplayer igual o boardgame cooperativo
loved the board game, love this game too!

Great adaptation of the board game, with tweaks that are only feasible in the digital world. Extremely fun and good content with 30+ missions available for your $5. Those saying it's a cash grab clearly haven't shelled out $60+ for the board game which comes with only 6 characters and 12 missions.
An hour in and enjoying the game.
replyContent:
Hello Clint,

Could you please send a message to our Customer Support team here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/asmodee-net/?l=en&contact=1

Thank you.
Best regards,

Asmodee Digital

content: Is fun, and close to being the board game.

They do justice to the actual board game, honestly a solid effort. The comic story is corney to be honest but still fun. Unlike other players it doesn't appear that i have hit a pay wall yet. But I do have a sneaking supicion that it will show its ugly head soon. I have just commenced Zone 2 and only have 4 weapons (1 for each character) if i dont get any more in the upcoming zone then this may be the game forcing me to buy characters for the weapon diversity. Will keep y'all posted
Decent adaptation of the board game. Only annoyance on my end is that you only get 5 characters for the base price. Would have been nice to get a little more variety.

There is $20 of DLC, which consists of 8 characters. They give four characters for free, and one for signing up for an account. The DLC characters do not seem necessary, but it is a very steep pay wall. It's $2.99 per character or a bundle of two for $4.99. Total cost is $25 for the game and DLC. Base game is good, but hiding content behind a steep pay wall in game feels scummy. I have all the other Asmodee games and most DLC but this is the first where the cost doesn't really match the content.

$5 gets you a solid game with 5 characters. The characters are pretty good to. if you played the board game, this is similar, but with its own flavor and twist. Kill zombies, survive, go for objectives. I'm enjoying it. Extra characters are what you can currently buy. While they characters are interesting, they arent required. Your starting characters are fine to play with. Works great on samsung s9.  Reserving 5 star until I know if they will continue to support game past the initial level offering. I think there are 40 some levels post the tutorial, but dont know for sure yet. Would love both extra levels and extra characters, like some of the kickstarter characters or extra seasons. Would love to play my favorite character (Grindlock). BTW, @Asmodee, I'm happy to pay for extra level packs and characters.
Appilaction Error dbclasses on a Samsung Note 3. Refunding for now until fixed.
replyContent:
Hello,

Could you please send a message to our Customer Support team here: https://asmodee.helpshift.com/a/asmodee-net/?l=en&contact=1

Thank you.
Best regards,

Asmodee Digital

content: Perfect adaptation of the game for solo campaign play
Cash Grab, 5 bucks for the game then you try to squeeze everyones wallets by having content locked behind $3 character paywalls? Shame on you. Bad business practices.
So far pretty fun, even though it's different than the board game
Manages to capture the fun of the board game. There are some changes, but si far seems likr a giod adaption to play on the go.
